abstract: The creators of the Scandic Grand Central hotel plan to bring some much-needed cool to the neighborhood of Norrmalm.
snippet: The creators of the Scandic Grand Central hotel plan to bring some much-needed cool to the neighborhood of Norrmalm.
lead_paragraph: Stockholm's tourist-grade hotels may be clustered in Norrmalm, near the Central Station, but as far as the city's fashionable flocks are concerned, the area is dead at night, filled with clueless out-of-towners. The Scandic Grand Central, which opened Oct. 1, has a secret plan to change that, and bring some much-needed cool to the neighborhood. Call it the Ace Hotel maneuver.

headline.main: Now Booking | Stockholm's Answer to the Ace
